quest.name: A Job for a Loporrit
journal:
 Quest Sync
The wandering Loporrit is looking for “work.”
objectives: Place the bags of beast repellent at the designated locations.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04321
dialogue.text: Haven't we met before? You're...one of Urianger's friends, yes?

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04321
dialogue.text: Ah, I thought so! I'm here wandering around Labyrinthos, hoping to find some “work” to do. It sounds like such fun!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04321
dialogue.text: But I don't even know where to start or how to ask for it. Can you help me?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Of course!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I suppose...

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04321
dialogue.text: Well then, what are we waiting for!? Let's find someone with “work” for me!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04321
dialogue.text: Perhaps this person can help us!

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04321
dialogue.text: Is there something I can help you and your...uh...friend with?

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04321
dialogue.text: Hm, I'd heard Loporrits were interested in learning about our culture. And you're saying this one is looking for a job...?

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04321
dialogue.text: Yes, I would like to “work” at a “job”! Do you know of one I could do?

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04321
dialogue.text: Well, most people here work at Aporia or Thaumazein, but we would need to submit documents to request the proper level of clearance and─ Oh! I have an idea!

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04321
dialogue.text: As you've seen, the man-made habitats hereabouts are populated by a variety of experimental subjects. Some of the bolder beasts, however, have been known to cause unfortunate incidents in and around the elemental reactors.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04321
dialogue.text: In order to encourage these creatures to keep their distance, we've put together some bags of noxious-smelling repellent. I'd appreciate it if you could place a few of them by the reactors themselves.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04321
dialogue.text: For now, I need you to ward two such facilities: the one to the south, and the one to the west of Logistikon Beta. Here, there's an armful for each of you so you can split the work.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04321
dialogue.text: Oh. I'm sorry for making you “work,” too. But that means we can share the payment as well!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04321
dialogue.text: Right! I'll go to the south reactor, and you take the one in the west. Work, work, work...

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04321
dialogue.text: Go ahead and place a few of those bags by the reactor west of Logistikon Beta.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04321
dialogue.text: I'm all done! Would you mind making a report to our employer?

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04321
dialogue.text: Thank you both for your cooperation. I'll hand the payment to our lunar friend here so that she might have the full “job” experience.

dialogue.name: RESEARCHER04321
dialogue.text: Oh, and I'll throw in some apples from Meryall Agronomics, too. Enjoy!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04321
dialogue.text: Oh, a new food to try! Let's head back up the stairs and eat them together!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04321
dialogue.text: Time to munch on these “apples”! They look delicious, don't they?

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04321
dialogue.text: Oh my... They don't just look delicious, they are delicious! They might be even better than carrots...

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04321
dialogue.text: I thought this place would be just like Mare Lamentorum since it's all artificial, but I'm glad I was wrong.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04321
dialogue.text: I was wrong about a lot, even after everything Urianger told me to expect. And I learned so much at my “job”! I think I want to try another one.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04321
dialogue.text: Oh, before I forget, here's your share of our payment. Thank you for all your help!
